remarks: The value of vector subtraction in the closed kernel dual space. (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdvsub.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvsub.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsub.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdvsub.n $e |- N = ( invg ` S ) $.
lcdvsub.e $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` S ) $.
lcdvsub.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsub.v $e |- V = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdvsub.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` C ) $.
lcdvsub.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` C ) $.
lcdvsub.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` C ) $.
lcdvsub.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvsub.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
lcdvsub.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
lcdvsub $p |- ( ph -> ( F .- G ) = ( F .+ ( ( N ` .1. ) .x. G ) ) ) $.
